name: More Salad!
description:
Put a salad bar in your iPod Touch or iPhone! It's the latest food app from Maverick Software, the creators of the hits Cupcakes!, More Sundaes!, More Toast! and More Pizza!

** Our first big free update is here! We listened to your requests and added:

- Taco salad ingredients - edible tortilla bowl, taco meat, salsa (red & green), sour cream and guacamole!
- Honey mustard dressing
- More ingredients - grilled steak, zucchini, parmesan cheese
- A salad-meter option with worldwide rankings!
- Grilled chicken is now sliced
- Options to hide non-veggies, have stronger tossing, and put all the ingredients in a single list
**

More Salad! gives you all the ingredients you need to make, eat, and share virtual salads.

First, pick your favorite plate, then load up with 50 different salad fixings, from all kinds of greens to veggies, fruit, nuts, and cheeses. Put as much or as little as you want on your plate, then shake your phone to toss it together!

Next, you can pour on 7 dressings, including classics like ranch, italian, french, caesar, thousand island, blue cheese, and oil & vinegar. If you want to coat your salad with dressing, toss it again!

Finally, add toppings like tofu, bacon bits, grilled chicken, salmon, or croutons.

When you're done, you can virtually eat your salad, a bite at a time. Or email a photo (even including an automatically built recipe card!) to a friend.

You've made cupcakes, toast, and pizzas on your phone, now it's time for a salad!

More Salad Features:

- 50 ingredients: iceberg lettuce, mixed greens, bibb lettuce, spinach, romaine, endive, red leaf lettuce, baby carrots, cucumbers, croutons, bacon bits, cherry tomatoes, bananas, blackberries, blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, peanuts, almonds, sliced tomatoes, black olives, green olives, mushrooms, green peppers, broccoli, purple onions, hard boiled eggs, sunflower seeds, pickles, anchovies, blue cheese, shredded cheddar, shredded mozzarella, shredded carrots, cottage cheese, feta cheese, kiwi, ham, grilled chicken, tofu, grilled shrimp, salmon, pepperoncini, apple slices, jalapenos, celery, sun dried tomatoes, radishes, red peppers, green peas
- 7 salad dressings: ranch, italian, french, caesar, thousand island, blue cheese, and oil & vinegar
- Save photos of your creations to your photo album or email them to friends
- Automatic recipe cards you can optionally mail with your photo
- 15 plates and 12 tablecloths
- Multiple level undo when adding salad ingredients & toppings

If you have suggestions for new features or toppings, post a review and let us know!
